articles.title: Russia launches largest drone attack on Ukraine since war began
articles.description: Russia unleashed its largest-ever aerial assault on Ukraine, firing over 800 drones and more than a dozen missiles overnight. The attack caused extensive damage, with a key government building in Kyiv being set on fire, and resulted in civilian casualties.

articles.title: Houthi drone strikes Israeli airport in rare attack
articles.description: A drone launched by Houthi rebels from Yemen struck an airport in southern Israel, temporarily shutting down commercial airspace. This rare direct hit comes as Israel continues its expanded operations in Gaza City.

articles.title: South Korea to bring home 300 workers detained in massive Hyundai plant raid in Georgia
articles.description: South Korea is sending a charter plane to repatriate 300 of its citizens who were detained during a major immigration raid at a Hyundai electric vehicle plant construction site in Georgia. The US administration stated the raid was part of a crackdown on illegal immigration and labor law violations.
